item.title: bitesized website
item.description: I created another website, this time for Bitesized. This one was was considerably less work than the tlocrt website. I had some more skillz this time around and I could reuse the theme I had already built. Since most of the Bitesized cover art is greyscale, I went with a simple greyscale look. Bitesized is a DIY band. I tried conveying this by using a handwritten font in the headers and by incorporating custom handwritten letters in the logo.

item.title: tlocrt website
item.description: This website was created in Hugo. Since I was a web development noob, it took a small eternity. But it was fun! What you’re seeing is a custom Hugo theme, developed by following the first ~1/3 of the helpful book Build Websites with Hugo by Brian P. Hogan and then freestyling (aka typing semi-coherent questions into various search engines and LLMs until something started working). Here is a picture of what the homepage looked like in September 2024.
